original: gnas par byed pa med na 'jig byed med par yang 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas par byed pa med na 'jig byed med par yang 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: If endurance does not exist, destruction would occur without a cause of destruction.

original: gnas par byed pa yod na ni 'jig pa'i rgyu med par 'jig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gnas par byed pa yod na ni 'jig pa'i rgyu med par 'jig pa ma yin te /
translated: If there were an enduring cause, then it would not disintegrate without a cause of disintegration.

original: des na 'jig byed kyi sngar gnas par byed pa'i phyir gnas par byed pa'i yin pas don med pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na 'jig byed kyi sngar gnas par byed pa'i phyir gnas par byed pa'i yin pas don med pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, since the enduring cause exists prior to the cause of disintegration, it is not pointless.

original: de lta na 'o na 'jig pa'i rgyu med par thal bas rang gi rgyu nyid las de lta bur 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir 'jig pa'i dngos po'i chos nyid yin pas /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na 'jig pa'i rgyu med par thal bas rang gi rgyu nyid las de lta bur 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir 'jig pa'i dngos po'i chos nyid yin pas /
translated: If that were so, then it follows that disintegration would be causeless, but it is not, because it arises from its own cause. Therefore, since it is the intrinsic reality of a thing that is disintegrating,

original: yod pa la ste yod pa'i don la 'di gnod par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa la ste yod pa'i don la 'di gnod par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it does not undermine the meaning of existence.

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin gang gis kyang gzhan du bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin gang gis kyang gzhan du bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the intrinsic reality of a thing cannot be made otherwise by anything,

original: gnas pa'i rgyus ni ci zhig bya /
analyzed: gnas pa'i rgyus ni ci zhig bya /
translated: what would the cause of endurance do?

original: 'on te gnas pa'i rgyu med na 'jig par 'gyur ba las @73a * //
analyzed: 'on te gnas pa'i rgyu med na 'jig par 'gyur ba las @73a * //
translated: But if the cause of endurance does not exist, then it would disintegrate.

original: gnas pa'i rgyu yod na 'jig pa la gegs byed do zhe na /
analyzed: gnas pa'i rgyu yod na 'jig pa la gegs byed do zhe na /
translated: If the cause of endurance exists, then it would prevent disintegration.

original: 'jig pa'i gegs de yang 'jig pa las gzhan pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'jig pa'i gegs de yang 'jig pa las gzhan pa yin nam /
translated: But would that which prevents disintegration be different from disintegration?

original: des na 'jig pa ci yang ma yin pa'i phyir 'jig par 'gyur ba nyid pas ji ltar gnas /
analyzed: des na 'jig pa ci yang ma yin pa'i phyir 'jig par 'gyur ba nyid pas ji ltar gnas /
translated: Therefore, since it is not anything that is destroyed, how could it endure since it is not destroyed?

original: 'on te skad cig so sor 'jig pa'i ngang can gnas par byed pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: 'on te skad cig so sor 'jig pa'i ngang can gnas par byed pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: But if it is the case that it endures due to being different from that which is momentary and subject to destruction,

original: de'i rgyu 'jig pa yang rgyu med pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid skad cig so sor 'jig pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i rgyu 'jig pa yang rgyu med pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid skad cig so sor 'jig pa yin no //
translated: then its cause, destruction, would be causeless, and therefore it would be momentary and subject to destruction.

original: de'ang gnas par byed pa las gzhan du skyes pa'i phyir 'di skyed par byed pa nyid yin gyi gnas par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'ang gnas par byed pa las gzhan du skyes pa'i phyir 'di skyed par byed pa nyid yin gyi gnas par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, since it arises as different from that which endures, it is a cause of that which is destroyed, but it is not a cause of endurance.

original: yang na gal te gnas par byed pa las 'jig pa po dang phrad kyi bar du mi 'jig pa gnas pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yang na gal te gnas par byed pa las 'jig pa po dang phrad kyi bar du mi 'jig pa gnas pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say: That which endures is not destroyed until it comes into contact with that which causes destruction,

original: de lta yin na mi 'jig par skyes pas 'di gnod pa ma yin pa'i phyir gnas pa'i rgyus ci zhig bya /
analyzed: de lta yin na mi 'jig par skyes pas 'di gnod pa ma yin pa'i phyir gnas pa'i rgyus ci zhig bya /
translated: then since that which is born as not subject to destruction is not harmed, what would the cause of endurance do?

original: 'on te gnas par byed pa yod pa'i dus nyid du mi 'jig pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te gnas par byed pa yod pa'i dus nyid du mi 'jig pa yin na /
translated: But if it is not destroyed at the time when that which causes endurance exists,üîΩthen it would not be destroyed at any time.

original: de lta na gnas par byed pa la skad cig so sor mi 'jig pa gzhan dang gzhan yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na gnas par byed pa la skad cig so sor mi 'jig pa gzhan dang gzhan yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the one that endures would be different from the one that does not disintegrate moment by moment.

original: gnas pa po'i gnas pa yang cis byas /
analyzed: gnas pa po'i gnas pa yang cis byas /
translated: And what would the enduring of the enduring one endure?

original: rang gi rgyus byas so zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi rgyus byas so zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is produced by its own cause,

original: gnas par bya ba yang de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir gnas par byed pas ci bya /
analyzed: gnas par bya ba yang de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir gnas par byed pas ci bya /
translated: then the one that endures would also be like that, so what would the one that endures do?

original: 'on te 'ga' zhig ni gnas pa pos gnas la /
analyzed: 'on te 'ga' zhig ni gnas pa pos gnas la /
translated: But if you say that some things endure by enduring,

original: 'ga' zhig ni rang nyid du zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ni rang nyid du zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba yin no zhe na /
translated: and some things endure by themselves, this is a distinction.

original: de lta na 'o na rnam par shes pa yang rang nyid gnas par ci ste mi 'dod /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na rnam par shes pa yang rang nyid gnas par ci ste mi 'dod /
translated: If that is so, then why do you not assert that consciousness endures by itself?

original: ci ste yang sa phyogs chu la sogs pa'i rten du mthong ba yin no /
analyzed: ci ste yang sa phyogs chu la sogs pa'i rten du mthong ba yin no /
translated: But we see that the earth and so on endure in dependence on water and so on.

original: mthong ba ni rnam par rtog pa rgyus kyang gnod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba ni rnam par rtog pa rgyus kyang gnod pa ma yin no //
translated: But the view that the earth and so on endure in dependence on water and so on is not undermined by reasoning.

original: des na yod med dag rten med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gi tshul ni don med pa yin te /
analyzed: des na yod med dag rten med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gi tshul ni don med pa yin te /
translated: Therefore the statement, ‚ÄúBecause existence and nonexistence are not without a basis,‚Äù is meaningless,

original: mthong ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: mthong ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it contradicts what is seen.

original: 'di la yang bshad pa ni /üîΩgal te dper na chu sogs kyi //
analyzed: 'di la yang bshad pa ni / gal te dper na chu sogs kyi //
translated: Here, the explanation is as follows:üîΩIf you say that it is like the support of water, etc.,

original: rten bzhin zhe na 'di la mtshungs //
analyzed: rten bzhin zhe na 'di la mtshungs //
translated: it is not the same.

original: dngos rnams skad cig re rer ni //üîΩ'jig na dngos rgyun de lta bur //
analyzed: dngos rnams skad cig re rer ni // 'jig na dngos rgyun de lta bur //
translated: If things are destroyed every moment,üîΩthen the stream of things is the support

original: skye rgyun yin phyir de rten yin //
analyzed: skye rgyun yin phyir de rten yin //
translated: because the stream of arising is like the stream of things.

original: de lta min na rigs ma yin //
analyzed: de lta min na rigs ma yin //
translated: If it were not so, it would not be logical.

original: bo ba yi ni gegs byed phyir //
analyzed: bo ba yi ni gegs byed phyir //
translated: Because it obstructs the falling,

original: cu sogs kyi ni rten 'gyur gyi //üîΩ'gro ba med can yon tan spyi //
analyzed: cu sogs kyi ni rten 'gyur gyi // 'gro ba med can yon tan spyi //
translated: water, etc. are the support of the falling.üîΩBut what need is there for a support

original: las rnams la ni rten ci dgos //
analyzed: las rnams la ni rten ci dgos //
translated: for actions that do not move, such as the general qualities?

original: chu la sogs pa la yang sa gzhi la sogs pa yod pa dang med pa'i phyogs dag gi rten du mi 'thad pa'i phyir dpe mthong ba med do //
analyzed: chu la sogs pa la yang sa gzhi la sogs pa yod pa dang med pa'i phyogs dag gi rten du mi 'thad pa'i phyir dpe mthong ba med do //
translated: There is no example of this because it is not tenable that the earth, etc. are the support of the existence and nonexistence of water, etc.

original: @73b gal te rten gyi dngos po mthong ba'i phyir ci ltar ma mthong zhe na /
analyzed: @73b gal te rten gyi dngos po mthong ba'i phyir ci ltar ma mthong zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not unseen because the nature of the support is seen,

original: ma mthong ba nyid la khyed mthong bar mngon par rlom pa yin no //
analyzed: ma mthong ba nyid la khyed mthong bar mngon par rlom pa yin no //
translated: you are just imagining what is unseen to be seen.

original: byed pa po dang las kyi bya ba la gzhir 'gyur ba gang yin pa ni rten yin no zhes bya ba ni lugs yin te /
analyzed: byed pa po dang las kyi bya ba la gzhir 'gyur ba gang yin pa ni rten yin no zhes bya ba ni lugs yin te /
translated: The basis of the activity of the agent and action is the support.

original: 'dzin pa'i phyir rten yin no //üîΩ'dzin pa yang ltung ba la yin na gang ltung ba de ni mi 'dzin la /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i phyir rten yin no // 'dzin pa yang ltung ba la yin na gang ltung ba de ni mi 'dzin la /
translated: It is the support because it holds.

original: gang 'dzin pa de ni ltung ba ma dmigs te /
analyzed: gang 'dzin pa de ni ltung ba ma dmigs te /
translated: But if it falls, it does not hold, and if it holds, it does not fall.üîΩThe falling and the holding are not observed in the same thing,

original: ltung ba dang mi ltung ba dag phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltung ba dang mi ltung ba dag phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because falling and not falling are mutually exclusive.

original: sngar ltung ba phyis mi 'byung ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sngar ltung ba phyis mi 'byung ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If it falls first and then does not fall,

original: 'o na gang ltung ba de gzung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na gang ltung ba de gzung ba ma yin te /
translated: then that which falls is not held,

original: mngon sum gyis gcig tu ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis gcig tu ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not directly perceived as one.

original: ltung ba dang cig shos khyab pa gnas pa po gcig ni dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ltung ba dang cig shos khyab pa gnas pa po gcig ni dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: The falling and the other, the support, are not observed in the same thing.

original: khyab pa ma yin na yang ci ltar gnas pa po nyid yin /
analyzed: khyab pa ma yin na yang ci ltar gnas pa po nyid yin /
translated: If it is not pervaded, how can it be a support?

original: da ltar yang gnas so zhes gzung na ni gnas pa po de ltar gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: da ltar yang gnas so zhes gzung na ni gnas pa po de ltar gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is held as present, then it is held as a support.

original: rim gyis khyab par 'dzin to zhe na /
analyzed: rim gyis khyab par 'dzin to zhe na /
translated: If it is held as pervaded gradually,

original: rim gyi don ci yin zhes soms shig / dngos po dang dngos po med pa rim du brjod pa yin la de yang dus tha dad pa dag yin no //üîΩdngos po dang dngos po med pa la gzung ba'am 'dzin pa'i yin grang na /
analyzed: rim gyi don ci yin zhes soms shig / dngos po dang dngos po med pa rim du brjod pa yin la de yang dus tha dad pa dag yin no // dngos po dang dngos po med pa la gzung ba'am 'dzin pa'i yin grang na /
translated: The sequence of entity and non-entity is a sequence of different times.

original: gzung ba'i dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang 'brel na ni gcig nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba'i dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang 'brel na ni gcig nyid ma yin no //
translated: If it is a sequence of entity and non-entity in terms of the object grasped and the subject that grasps, then it is not a sequence of a single entity.

original: 'dzin par byed pa rim dang ldan pa yin na ni gzung ba la yang der 'gyur ba'i phyir gzung ba gnas pa po gcig ma yin no //üîΩde'i phyir cung zhig ni 'das par gzung ngo //
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa rim dang ldan pa yin na ni gzung ba la yang der 'gyur ba'i phyir gzung ba gnas pa po gcig ma yin no // de'i phyir cung zhig ni 'das par gzung ngo //
translated: If it is a sequence of the subject that grasps, then it is not a sequence of a single object grasped, because the object grasped would also be a sequence.

original: cung zhig ni da ltar 'dzin to //üîΩcung zhig ni ma 'ongs pa na 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul nyid rim pa yin pas na /
analyzed: cung zhig ni da ltar 'dzin to // cung zhig ni ma 'ongs pa na 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul nyid rim pa yin pas na /
translated: Therefore, some is grasped as past, some is grasped as present, and some is grasped as future.üîΩSince the sequence is the domain of such conceptualization,

original: gang gis dmigs pa'i phyir rten dang brten pa'i dngos po zhes brjod pa mngon sum gyis rim pa 'dzin pa gal yod /
analyzed: gang gis dmigs pa'i phyir rten dang brten pa'i dngos po zhes brjod pa mngon sum gyis rim pa 'dzin pa gal yod /
translated: the sequence of the object grasped and the subject that grasps is not established by direct perception.

original: de phyir yod med dam rten med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di nyid yin no //
analyzed: de phyir yod med dam rten med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of ‚Äúbecause of the non-existence of the basis‚Äù is just this.

original: 'di ltar rten dang brten pa'i dngos po nyid ni mthong ba med pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ltar rten dang brten pa'i dngos po nyid ni mthong ba med pa nyid do //
translated: Thus, the very non-perception of the relation of support and the supported is the non-perception of the relation of the basis and the based.

original: de'i phyir rten dang brten pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par rtog pa tsam du zad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rten dang brten pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par rtog pa tsam du zad do //
translated: Therefore, the relation of support and the supported is just a conceptual discrimination.

original: 'o na ji ltar rten dang brten pa'i dngos por rtog pa yang de mthong ba med par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar rten dang brten pa'i dngos por rtog pa yang de mthong ba med par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how can the relation of support and the supported be a conceptual discrimination if it is not perceived?

original: 'o na ni phyin ci log gi rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //üîΩgzhan yang skad cig so sor @74a * //
analyzed: 'o na ni phyin ci log gi rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar 'gyur ro // gzhan yang skad cig so sor @74a * //
translated: Well then, it would not be a conceptual discrimination that is erroneous.

original: 'jig pa yul gzhan dang gzhan du skye ba can rnams kyi nye bar len pa'i yul du skye ba ni rten dang 'brel pas byas pa yin te /
analyzed: 'jig pa yul gzhan dang gzhan du skye ba can rnams kyi nye bar len pa'i yul du skye ba ni rten dang 'brel pas byas pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, the arising of those that are momentary and perish individually in other and other places is related to the basis by way of the arising in the object that is appropriated.

original: de las de ltar skye ba'i phyir sa gzhi la sogs pa de rten yin te rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las de ltar skye ba'i phyir sa gzhi la sogs pa de rten yin te rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The arising of those in the object that is appropriated is related to the basis because it arises from that, just as the arising of a sprout, etc. is related to the seed, etc. The basis is the cause of that.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma dag gcig tu sgro btags nas skabs khyad par can gyi rgyu nyid la rten du brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma dag gcig tu sgro btags nas skabs khyad par can gyi rgyu nyid la rten du brjod pa yin no //
translated: The former and latter are imagined to be one, and the cause of the special occasion is called the basis.

original: gcig tu sgro btags pa yin na skye bar mi rtogs shing snga ma 'dzin par yang sgro btags pa'i phyir thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi mthu las phyin ci log tu rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig tu sgro btags pa yin na skye bar mi rtogs shing snga ma 'dzin par yang sgro btags pa'i phyir thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi mthu las phyin ci log tu rtogs pa yin no //
translated: If it is imagined to be one, it is not understood as arising, and because the former is imagined to be grasped, it is understood as mistaken from the power of beginningless habitual tendencies.

original: de nyid kyi phyir snga ma snga ma'i bag chags kyis 'jug pa'i phyir rgyun thog ma med pa nyid kyi 'jig rten pha rol grub pa'i phyir mi 'dod pa thog tu bab bo //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir snga ma snga ma'i bag chags kyis 'jug pa'i phyir rgyun thog ma med pa nyid kyi 'jig rten pha rol grub pa'i phyir mi 'dod pa thog tu bab bo //
translated: Therefore, because of the engagement of the habitual tendencies of the former, the world beyond is established as having no beginning, and so the unwanted consequence befalls you.

original: 'di ltar / dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bos na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bos na //
translated: Thus:

original: yid kyi rtog pa thams cad ni //
analyzed: yid kyi rtog pa thams cad ni //
translated: All mental conceptions

original: sngon gyi shes pa las byung ste //
analyzed: sngon gyi shes pa las byung ste //
translated: arise from the former consciousness,üîΩdue to the nature of having no object,

original: smig rgyu la ni chur rtogs bzhin //
analyzed: smig rgyu la ni chur rtogs bzhin //
translated: like the conception of water in a mirage.

original: snga phyi gcig tu rtogs pa ni ;
analyzed: snga phyi gcig tu rtogs pa ni ;
translated: The conception of former and latter as one

original: / dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo yi //
analyzed: / dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo yi //
translated: is due to the nature of having no object.

original: rjes su 'gro ba yin te gcig nyid med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdngos po du ma nyid las 'gyur te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba yin te gcig nyid med pa'i phyir ro // dngos po du ma nyid las 'gyur te /
translated: It is a subsequent pursuer because it is not a single entity.

original: de'i 'bras bu nyid du mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu nyid du mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: It is a multiplicity of things because it is seen to be the result of that.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: smig rgyu la chur rtogs pa ni de tsam gyi rgyu mtshan can ma yin te /
analyzed: smig rgyu la chur rtogs pa ni de tsam gyi rgyu mtshan can ma yin te /
translated: The conception of a mirage as water is not due to a mere cause,

original: sngon gyi chu mthong ba'i 'du byed pas skye ba'i phyir gcig nyid ni sngon yang dmigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sngon gyi chu mthong ba'i 'du byed pas skye ba'i phyir gcig nyid ni sngon yang dmigs pa ma yin te /
translated: because it arises from the formative force of previously seeing water. A single entity is not previously observed,

original: des na skye ba gzhan du yang gcig tu rtog ste skye ba gzhan gyis gcig tu 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro ba yin la de yang de lta bu yin pa'i phyir thog ma med pa'i rtog pa brgyud pa yin pas srog chags rnams kyi rgyun thog ma medüîΩpar grub bo //
analyzed: des na skye ba gzhan du yang gcig tu rtog ste skye ba gzhan gyis gcig tu 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro ba yin la de yang de lta bu yin pa'i phyir thog ma med pa'i rtog pa brgyud pa yin pas srog chags rnams kyi rgyun thog ma medüîΩpar grub bo //
translated: and therefore it is conceived to be single in another birth. The prior conception of a single entity is preceded by the conception of a single entity in another birth. Since that is also like that, the continuum of living beings is beginningless.üîΩThus the beginninglessness of the continuum of living beings is established.

original: de bzhin du bdag la sogs par 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'i blo rgyun thog ma med par de ltar 'gyur zhing phyis kyang mi 'chad pa yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag la sogs par 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'i blo rgyun thog ma med par de ltar 'gyur zhing phyis kyang mi 'chad pa yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med do //
translated: Likewise, the mind that possesses the apprehension of ‚ÄúI‚Äù and so on has existed in a continuum since beginningless time, and it will continue in a continuum without end. Therefore cyclic existence has no beginning or end.üîΩMoreover:

original: gzhan yang / bo ba yi ni gegs byed phyir //
analyzed: gzhan yang / bo ba yi ni gegs byed phyir //
translated: Because it obstructs the flow,

original: chu sogs kyi ni rten 'gyur gyi //üîΩ'gro ba sems can yon tan spyi //
analyzed: chu sogs kyi ni rten 'gyur gyi // 'gro ba sems can yon tan spyi //
translated: it is the support of water, etc.üîΩBut what need is there for a support

original: las rnams la rten ci zhig dgos //
analyzed: las rnams la rten ci zhig dgos //
translated: for the qualities, universals, and actions of beings?

original: chu la sogs pa la ni bo ba'i gegs byed pa'i rgyu rten yin no zhes rigs kyi /
analyzed: chu la sogs pa la ni bo ba'i gegs byed pa'i rgyu rten yin no zhes rigs kyi /
translated: It is reasonable to say that the support is the cause that obstructs the flow of water, etc.

original: yon tan dang spyi dang las bya ba med pa 'gro ba dang mi ldan pa rnams la rten ci dgos /
analyzed: yon tan dang spyi dang las bya ba med pa 'gro ba dang mi ldan pa rnams la rten ci dgos /
translated: But what need is there for a support for beings who are devoid of qualities, universals, and actions?

original: sems pa spyi dang yon tan dang las yin nam gzhan du @74b yang rung ste rnam pa thams cad du bya ba med pa yin pa'i phyir 'di la rten gyi dgos pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sems pa spyi dang yon tan dang las yin nam gzhan du @74b yang rung ste rnam pa thams cad du bya ba med pa yin pa'i phyir 'di la rten gyi dgos pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Whether it is the universal of cognition, the quality of cognition, or the action of cognition, it is in no way an entity. Therefore there is no need for a support.

original: des na brten pa ma yin pa'i sems pa ni rten ma yin pa zhig pas 'jig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na brten pa ma yin pa'i sems pa ni rten ma yin pa zhig pas 'jig pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the non-support of thought is not destroyed by the destruction of the non-support.

original: de ni lhan cig gnas pa tsam du zad de ji ltar lhan cig gnas pa de ltar ni sngar bstan zin to //
analyzed: de ni lhan cig gnas pa tsam du zad de ji ltar lhan cig gnas pa de ltar ni sngar bstan zin to //
translated: It is merely a co-existence, and it has been explained above how it is a co-existence.

original: gal te ji ltar 'gro ba can nyid ma yin yang /
analyzed: gal te ji ltar 'gro ba can nyid ma yin yang /
translated: Even though it is not a going,

analyzed: 'di ni med de /
translated: This is not so.

original: 'ga' tshe chags sogs rgyas sogs kyi //
analyzed: 'ga' tshe chags sogs rgyas sogs kyi //

original: 'phel ba bde sdug las skyes yin //
analyzed: 'phel ba bde sdug las skyes yin //

original: de yang khams mnyam la sogs pa //
analyzed: de yang khams mnyam la sogs pa //

analyzed: bde ba na ni sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de nyid sad par 'gyur ba yin na /

analyzed: sdug bsngal ba la go zhe sdang ji ltar zhe na /

analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ni @76b thams cad du me bzod pa des de yongs su 'dor ba'i bdag nyid ni sdang pa nyid do //

original: 'dir nges ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir nges ba ni yod pa ma yin te /

original: yid sdug bsngal ba na so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa dag rang gi sdug bsngal gyi rjes su dpag nas brtse ba skye ba nyid dam /
analyzed: yid sdug bsngal ba na so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa dag rang gi sdug bsngal gyi rjes su dpag nas brtse ba skye ba nyid dam /

analyzed: de'i phyir gzhil ba'i rgyu la chags par yang 'gyur ro //

analyzed: 'di ni yod pa ma yin te /

analyzed: khams mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid nang gi don nye ba las /

analyzed: des na phyi rol yang rten du thal bar 'gyur na 'dod pa ni ma yin no //

original: gang gi tshe snying du sdug pa mthong ba la sogs pas khams mnyam pa la sogs pas nang gi don gyi khyad par yang dmigs pa ma yin pa de'i tshe ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag de la brten pa nyid ma yin no //

analyzed: yul ni rten ma yin la de ldog pas ldog pa yang ma yin no //

analyzed: stag nyid dang ni khrag la sogs //

original: thos pa dang ni mthong ba las //
analyzed: thos pa dang ni mthong ba las //

analyzed: rmongs pa la sogs 'byung 'gyur bzhin //

analyzed: de ni blo ni rten nam /

analyzed: de ldog na ldog pa nyid ma yin no //

original: lus ni bde ba la sogs pa'i dmigs pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: lus ni bde ba la sogs pa'i dmigs pa nyid yin te /

original: des na de dag kyang de ldog pa na ldog pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na de dag kyang de ldog pa na ldog pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the body is not the support of the mind, because the experience of pleasure, etc., does not cease when the body ceases,

original: dmigs pa gzhan la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa gzhan la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: but occurs in another body.

original: de phyir nges par gang yid kyi //
analyzed: de phyir nges par gang yid kyi //
translated: Therefore, the mind definitely is the support of the body,

original: 'du byed kyi ni rjes 'jug pa //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi ni rjes 'jug pa //
translated: because it follows the formative forces of the mind,

original: sems ni de med mi 'byung ba //
analyzed: sems ni de med mi 'byung ba //
translated: and because the mind does not occur without them.

original: de phyir sems la brten pa yin //
analyzed: de phyir sems la brten pa yin //

original: sems ni sems kyi 'du byed kyi rjes su nges par 'jug gi lus ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sems ni sems kyi 'du byed kyi rjes su nges par 'jug gi lus ni ma yin te /

original: lus ni rten nyid du ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus ni rten nyid du ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the body is not seen to be a support.

original: sems gzhan dang ldan pa gzhan la sems mi skye ba'i phyir sems ni sems nyid la brten pa yin no //
analyzed: sems gzhan dang ldan pa gzhan la sems mi skye ba'i phyir sems ni sems nyid la brten pa yin no //
translated: The mind is supported by the mind itself, because another mind does not arise in one who possesses another mind.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / 'du byed stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'du byed stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir //
translated: Because mental activity is strong,

original: rnam par g-yeng ba zlog par byed //
analyzed: rnam par g-yeng ba zlog par byed //
translated: distraction is averted.

original: rnam par g-yeng ba'i stobs ldan na //
analyzed: rnam par g-yeng ba'i stobs ldan na //
translated: When the power of distraction is strong,

original: 'du byed gzhan du phyogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'du byed gzhan du phyogs par 'gyur //
translated: mental activity is directed elsewhere.

original: gang gi tshe 'du byed shin tu stobs dang ldan pa de'i tshe bun long dag tu yang sems g-yeng bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'du byed shin tu stobs dang ldan pa de'i tshe bun long dag tu yang sems g-yeng bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When mental activity is very strong, then even in a state of distraction the mind does not become distracted.

original: gang gi tshe rnam par g-yeng ba'i dngos po stobs dang ldan pa de'i tshe 'du byed pa yod kyang rang gi 'bras bu rjes su mthun pa'i rigs pa skyed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rnam par g-yeng ba'i dngos po stobs dang ldan pa de'i tshe 'du byed pa yod kyang rang gi 'bras bu rjes su mthun pa'i rigs pa skyed pa ma yin no //
translated: When the power of distraction is strong, then even when mental activity is present, it does not generate its own result, which is a homogeneous continuum.

original: de'i phyir sems ni rnam par shes pa snga na med na mi 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sems ni rnam par shes pa snga na med na mi 'byung ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, mind is not prior to consciousness.

original: de'i phyir shes pa nyid ldog na sems ldog go zhes rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa nyid ldog na sems ldog go zhes rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to say that when consciousness ceases, mind ceases.

original: gal te dbang po las rnam par shes pa skye ba yin la /
analyzed: gal te dbang po las rnam par shes pa skye ba yin la /
translated: If consciousness arises from the sense faculties,

original: @77b de las kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: @77b de las kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba ma yin nam /
translated: and from that arises mental consciousness,

original: des na brgyud pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa lus nyid las 'byung ba'i phyir ji ltar lus rten ma yin /
analyzed: des na brgyud pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa lus nyid las 'byung ba'i phyir ji ltar lus rten ma yin /
translated: then, since mental consciousness arises from the body itself through a continuum, how can the body not be its basis?

original: brgyud pas rgyu yin yang me du ba'i rjes las skyes pa'i du ba zlog par byed pa ma yin pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: brgyud pas rgyu yin yang me du ba'i rjes las skyes pa'i du ba zlog par byed pa ma yin pa ni ma yin la /
translated: Even though it is a cause through a continuum, it is not the case that fire is not the antecedent of smoke that arises after smoke.

original: me gzhan dang gzhan las de snga na med pa mi 'byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: me gzhan dang gzhan las de snga na med pa mi 'byung ba ma yin no //
translated: And it is not the case that that smoke does not arise from another fire.

original: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang lus las skye bas du ba bzhin rgyun 'chad pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang lus las skye bas du ba bzhin rgyun 'chad pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: In the same way, since consciousness arises from the body, it would be a phenomenon that is interrupted like smoke.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni dbang po'i shes pa med kyang thog ma med pa'i bag chags las 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni dbang po'i shes pa med kyang thog ma med pa'i bag chags las 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro//
translated: The mental consciousness arises from beginningless predispositions, even when there is no sense consciousness.

original: du ba me las ci 'dra ba //
analyzed: du ba me las ci 'dra ba //
translated: What is smoke like in relation to fire?

original: rnam pa ci 'dra du las min //
analyzed: rnam pa ci 'dra du las min //
translated: What is the form of a thing in relation to its cause?

original: yid ni goms las ci 'dra ba //
analyzed: yid ni goms las ci 'dra ba //
translated: What is the mind like in relation to its predispositions?

original: de 'dra nyid ni dang po 'byung //
analyzed: de 'dra nyid ni dang po 'byung //
translated: It arises in the beginning in just that way.

original: mes bskyed pa'i du ba dang du bas bskyed pa'i du ba ni mtshan nyid gcig pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mes bskyed pa'i du ba dang du bas bskyed pa'i du ba ni mtshan nyid gcig pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Smoke produced by fire and smoke produced by a lens are not the same in every respect.

original: blo'i khyad par shes rab la sogs pa thams cad la khyab par bdag tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams ni goms pa'i de ma thag pa dang sngon yang rang bzhin mtshungs pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir du ba dpe ma yin no //
analyzed: blo'i khyad par shes rab la sogs pa thams cad la khyab par bdag tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams ni goms pa'i de ma thag pa dang sngon yang rang bzhin mtshungs pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir du ba dpe ma yin no //
translated: The differences in awareness, such as wisdom, are all pervaded by the apprehension of a self, and so on, and they are the same in nature, whether they are immediately preceded by predispositions or not. Therefore, smoke is not a good example.

original: du ba ni me'i khyad par nyid las dus cung zad rgyun gnas pa yin la /
analyzed: du ba ni me'i khyad par nyid las dus cung zad rgyun gnas pa yin la /
translated: Smoke is a slight distortion of fire, and it endures for a short time.

original: shes rab la sogs pa ni shes rab la sogs pa'i khyad par snga ma nyid las yin gyi de dag lus kyis gnas par byas pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab la sogs pa ni shes rab la sogs pa'i khyad par snga ma nyid las yin gyi de dag lus kyis gnas par byas pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The difference in the sharpness of the faculties of wisdom and so on is due to the previous differences in the faculties of wisdom and so on, not to the fact that they have been made to endure in the body.

original: gzhan yang / gal te rnam shes 'ga' zhig ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gal te rnam shes 'ga' zhig ni //
translated: Moreover, if a consciousness were to arise

original: sngon gyi rnam pa dang bral ba //üîΩdbang po nyid las skyes na ni //
analyzed: sngon gyi rnam pa dang bral ba // dbang po nyid las skyes na ni //
translated: from a sense faculty without a previous aspect,üîΩthen it would be possible for smoke to arise

original: du ba dper 'gyur srid pa yin //
analyzed: du ba dper 'gyur srid pa yin //
translated: without a fire.

original: dbang po las kyang rnam par shes pa 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: dbang po las kyang rnam par shes pa 'byung ba yin te /
translated: A consciousness arises from a sense faculty,

original: sngon gyi rnam par shes pa la ma ltos pa las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sngon gyi rnam par shes pa la ma ltos pa las ni ma yin te /
translated: but not without depending on a previous consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa snga ma yengs na dbang po dang yul phrad pa yod kyang mi skyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa snga ma yengs na dbang po dang yul phrad pa yod kyang mi skyed pa'i phyir ro //

translated: It would follow, absurdly, that the world would be born from the nature of the mother and so on.

original: 'o na 'jig rten pha rol smra ba la yang sngon gyi rang bzhin thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na 'jig rten pha rol smra ba la yang sngon gyi rang bzhin thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Well then, it would follow, absurdly, that in the case of those who advocate the existence of past and future lives, the world would be born from the nature of the past.

original: ma yin te /üîΩrnam par g-yengs pa'am /
analyzed: ma yin te / rnam par g-yengs pa'am /
translated: This is not the case.üîΩBecause some are distracted

original: mngal gyi gnas kyi sdug @79b bsngal gyis 'ga' zhig brjed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngal gyi gnas kyi sdug @79b bsngal gyis 'ga' zhig brjed pa'i phyir ro //

original: 'du byed pa'i rjes su 'jug pa 'ga' zhig ni yod pa nyid de skye ba dran pa yang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'du byed pa'i rjes su 'jug pa 'ga' zhig ni yod pa nyid de skye ba dran pa yang mthong ba'i phyir ro //

original: sngon med pa skyes pa la sdug bsngal yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sngon med pa skyes pa la sdug bsngal yod pa ma yin te /

original: de'i gnas skabs ni de nyid yin gyi gzhan ni med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i gnas skabs ni de nyid yin gyi gzhan ni med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the state of the father is just that, and not anything else.

original: gal te de nyid nye bar len pa nyid kyis skyed par byed pa yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te de nyid nye bar len pa nyid kyis skyed par byed pa yin na ni /
translated: If the father were to produce the son by means of appropriation,

analyzed: de nyid kyi lus bzhin du bu dang 'brel ba'i lus gzhan la yang dran par thal bar 'gyur ro // sdug bsngal bas de ma dran no zhe na /
translated: then it would follow, absurdly, that the father would remember the body of the son, just as he remembers his own body.üîΩIf you accept,

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: then it is not so,

original: de nyid kyi tshe der skyes pa la ni sdug bsngal ba yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe der skyes pa la ni sdug bsngal ba yod pa ma yin te /

original: dug gi srin bu bzhin no //
analyzed: dug gi srin bu bzhin no //
translated: just like a worm in poison.

original: 'jig rten gzhan nas 'ongs pa la ni de sdug bsngal ba yin te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gzhan nas 'ongs pa la ni de sdug bsngal ba yin te /

original: thog ma med pa'i goms pa la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i goms pa la brten pa'i phyir ro //

original: gzhan yang pha mas sdug bsngal myong bar thal te /
analyzed: gzhan yang pha mas sdug bsngal myong bar thal te /

original: dper na gnyid log pa'i lus kyi nang du gtogs pa'i rmi lam gyi lus kyi sdug bsngal myong ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gnyid log pa'i lus kyi nang du gtogs pa'i rmi lam gyi lus kyi sdug bsngal myong ba bzhin no //

original: bskyed par bya ba'i shing tshig pas skyed par byed pa'i shing rnying pa tsam du yang mi 'gyur ba bzhin du myong ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba'i shing tshig pas skyed par byed pa'i shing rnying pa tsam du yang mi 'gyur ba bzhin du myong ba yin zhe na /

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /

analyzed: shing phyi ma'i 'du byed pa ni shing snga ma la med pa'i phyir ro /

analyzed: des na sngar byas pa dran pa nyid du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: drod gsher las skyes pa la yang blo med par 'gyur te /

original: ma la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gal te lus rjes su 'gro bar dmigs pa'i phyir /

analyzed: des na de'i rjes su 'gro bar bsgrub pa ni grub pa la bsgrub pa nyid do //

analyzed: de'i rgyun nyid do zhe na /

original: de yang mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de yang mi 'thad de /

analyzed: rten dang brten pa gnas pa med //

analyzed: rang bzhin tsam la gnas pa la //

translated: But how can a capacity exist without being observed?

original: 'bras bu'i sgo nas de dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i sgo nas de dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the object is the result of the consciousness,

original: de dag gi 'bras bu gang yin ;
analyzed: de dag gi 'bras bu gang yin ;
translated: what is the result of the eye and so on?

original: bde ba la sogs pa dang gzugs la sogs pa dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa dang gzugs la sogs pa dmigs pa'o //
translated: Pleasure, etc. and form, etc. are the objects.

original: de yang nus pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ma dmigs pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: de yang nus pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ma dmigs pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: But since they are the potentiality, they are not the object.

original: lhag mar 'gyur ba gzugs la sogs pa de dag nyid yin par 'gyur na /
analyzed: lhag mar 'gyur ba gzugs la sogs pa de dag nyid yin par 'gyur na /
translated: If you say that the potentiality itself is the object, then the eye, etc. would be the object.

original: de dag ni rnam par shes pa'i nus pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni rnam par shes pa'i nus pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
translated: But the eye, etc. are not the result of the potentiality of consciousness.

original: mig la sogs pa 'bras bu nyid yin na ni sngar med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa 'bras bu nyid yin na ni sngar med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the eye, etc. were the result, it would follow that they would not exist prior to the cause.

original: dmigs pa'i gnas skabs 'bras bu yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i gnas skabs 'bras bu yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the state of being the object is the result,

original: rdul phra rab so sor dmigs par thal lo //
analyzed: rdul phra rab so sor dmigs par thal lo //
translated: it would follow that the individual atom would be the object.

original: khyad par med par ni gnas skabs tha dad par yang mi 'gyur ro //üîΩkhyad par yod na ni rang nyid rig par thal lo //
analyzed: khyad par med par ni gnas skabs tha dad par yang mi 'gyur ro // khyad par yod na ni rang nyid rig par thal lo //
translated: If there is no difference, the state would not be different.üîΩIf there is a difference, it would follow that it would be self-cognizant.

original: nus pa dang lhan cig skyes pa nyid khyad par yin no zhe na /
analyzed: nus pa dang lhan cig skyes pa nyid khyad par yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the difference is the potentiality itself,

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: that is not reasonable.

original: 'di ltar / lhan cig nyid na nus dpog cing //
analyzed: 'di ltar / lhan cig nyid na nus dpog cing //
translated: If you infer potency from simultaneity,

original: rjes dpag las kyang der 'dod pas //üîΩphan tshun brten pa'i nyes pa ni //
analyzed: rjes dpag las kyang der 'dod pas // phan tshun brten pa'i nyes pa ni //
translated: then you accept that inference from that.

original: ci ltar spong bar 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: ci ltar spong bar 'gyur ba yin //
translated: How can you avoid the error of mutual dependence?

original: dmigs pa nyid ni gzugs la sogs pa dag gi khyad par yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa nyid ni gzugs la sogs pa dag gi khyad par yin no //
translated: The object itself is the particular of form, etc.

original: gal te dmigs pa de nus pa dang lhan cig pa nyid yin na ci ltar nus pa ma grub par lhan cig pa nyid grub /
analyzed: gal te dmigs pa de nus pa dang lhan cig pa nyid yin na ci ltar nus pa ma grub par lhan cig pa nyid grub /
translated: If the object is simultaneous with potency, how can simultaneity be established when potency is not established?

original: de ma grub na ci ltar nus pa rjes su dpag / de'i phyir rnam par shes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa dang bde ba la sogs pa tsam rang rig pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de ma grub na ci ltar nus pa rjes su dpag / de'i phyir rnam par shes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa dang bde ba la sogs pa tsam rang rig pa nyid yin te /
translated: If that is not established, how can potency be inferred? Therefore consciousness is just the self-awareness of form, etc. and pleasure, etc.

original: rnam par shes pa bde ba la sogs pa zhes gzhi mthun par rtogs pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bde ba la sogs pa zhes gzhi mthun par rtogs pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cognition ‚Äúconsciousness is pleasure, etc.‚Äù arises as a common locus.

original: gzhi mthun pa ni gtso bo dang / brtags pa'i dbye ba las gzhan med //üîΩskyes bu dbyug pa de bzhin du //
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa ni gtso bo dang / brtags pa'i dbye ba las gzhan med // skyes bu dbyug pa de bzhin du //
translated: A common locus is nothing other than the distinction of the primary and the secondary.üîΩJust as a man with a stick,

original: skyes bu sems pa zhes bya bzhin //
analyzed: skyes bu sems pa zhes bya bzhin //
translated: just as a man with an intention.

original: gal te gtso bo ma yin na //
analyzed: gal te gtso bo ma yin na //
translated: If it is not the principal,

original: 'khri'u 'bod do //
analyzed: 'khri'u 'bod do //
translated: then it is a mere attendant.üîΩIf it is a mere attendant, then it is a stick.

original: skyes bu dbyig pa'o zhes @84b bya ba de ltar 'gyur na /
analyzed: skyes bu dbyig pa'o zhes @84b bya ba de ltar 'gyur na /
translated: If it is a stick, then it is a man.

original: de ni 'dir rab tu ma grub pa nyid de /
analyzed: de ni 'dir rab tu ma grub pa nyid de /
translated: But this is not established here.
